attributes.action: The loss of all human rights to those found guilty of murder or pedophilia charges
attributes.additional_details:
This is a petition for new adequate punishments and the invalidation of any human/legal rights a person has once they have been found guilty of murder or pedophilia charges.

New punishments should be enforced for those found guilty, such as: amputation, castration, public beatings and disclusion from any medical/legal rights/care. These punishments should be decided by the victims next of kin.
